title: Efficient energy and memory storage capabilities in optimized BiFeO3/MnMoO4/NiFe2O4 triphasic composites for futuristic multistate devices
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29260-29270
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05223D, Paper
Open Access

Izhar Sagheer, Muhammad Tamoor Ansar, Shahid M. Ramay, Houbing Huang, Shahid Atiq
The emergence of multiferroic materials particularly bismuth iron oxide (BiFeO3) with distinctive magnetoelectric, and high energy storage capabilities, present pivotal aspects for next-generation memory storage devices.
